document.full_text: the barbecue grill at keith and mary jane kasper's house in suburban chicago has been prepped and ready to go for more than a week, but it sits idle as unseasonably cold, damp weather has them cooking indoors.
document.title: cool, wet spring takes sizzle out of meat sales
lines_and_colors: the barbecue grill at keith and mary jane kasper's house in suburban chicago has been prepped and ready to go for more than a week, but it sits idle as unseasonably cold, damp weather has them cooking indoors.
